instantiate.title: InstantiateMsg
instantiate.description:
An empty struct that serves as a placeholder in different places, such as contracts that don't set a custom message.

It is designed to be expressable in correct JSON and JSON Schema but contains no meaningful data. Previously we used enums without cases, but those cannot represented as valid JSON Schema (https://github.com/CosmWasm/cosmwasm/issues/451)

oneOf.description: Manages owner state
Manages emergency owner state
Update contract config (only owner can call)
Initialize an asset on the money market (only owner can call)
Update an asset on the money market (only owner can call)

Update uncollateralized loan limit for a given user and asset. Overrides previous value if any. A limit of zero means no uncollateralized limit and the debt in that asset needs to be collateralized (only owner can call)

denom.description: Asset the user receives the credit in

oneOf.description: Deposit native coins. Deposited coins must be sent in the transaction this call is made

on_behalf_of.description: Address that will receive the coins

oneOf.description: Withdraw native coins

amount.description: Amount to be withdrawn. If None is specified, the full amount will be withdrawn.

recipient.description: The address where the withdrawn amount is sent

oneOf.description: Borrow native coins. If borrow allowed, amount is added to caller's debt and sent to the address.

recipient.description: The address where the borrowed amount is sent

oneOf.description: Repay native coins loan. Coins used to repay must be sent in the transaction this call is made.

on_behalf_of.description: Repay the funds for the user

oneOf.description:
Liquidate under-collateralized native loans. Coins used to repay must be sent in the transaction this call is made.

The liquidator will receive collateral shares. To get the underlying asset, consider sending a separate `withdraw` execute message.

collateral_denom.description: Denom of the collateral asset, which liquidator gets from the borrower

recipient.description: The address for receiving underlying collateral

user.description: The address of the borrower getting liquidated

oneOf.description: Update (enable / disable) asset as collateral for the caller

enable.description: Option to enable (true) / disable (false) asset as collateral

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)

deposit_cap.description: Deposit Cap defined in terms of the asset (Unlimited by default)

interest_rate_model.description: Interest rate strategy to calculate borrow_rate and liquidity_rate

liquidation_bonus.description: Bonus amount of collateral liquidator get when repaying user's debt (Will get collateral from user in an amount equal to debt repayed + bonus)

liquidation_threshold.description: uusd amount in debt position per uusd of asset collateral that if surpassed makes the user's position liquidatable.

max_loan_to_value.description: Max uusd that can be borrowed per uusd of collateral when using the asset as collateral

reserve_factor.description: Portion of the borrow rate that is kept as protocol rewards

slope_1.description: Slope parameter for interest rate model function when utilization_rate < optimal_utilization_rate

slope_2.description: Slope parameter for interest rate model function when utilization_rate >= optimal_utilization_rate

oneOf.description: Proposes a new owner to take role. Only current owner can execute.
Clears the currently proposed owner. Only current owner can execute.
Promotes the proposed owner to be the current one. Only the proposed owner can execute.
Throws away the keys to the Owner role forever. Once done, no owner can ever be set later.
Get config
Get asset market
Enumerate markets with pagination
Get uncollateralized limit for given user and asset
Get all uncollateralized limits for a given user
Get user debt position for a specific asset
Get all debt positions for a user
Get user collateral position for a specific asset
Get all collateral positions for a user
Get user position
Get liquidity scaled amount for a given underlying asset amount. (i.e: how much scaled collateral is added if the given amount is deposited)
Get equivalent scaled debt for a given underlying asset amount. (i.e: how much scaled debt is added if the given amount is borrowed)
Get underlying asset amount for a given asset and scaled amount. (i.e. How much underlying asset will be released if withdrawing by burning a given scaled collateral amount stored in state.)
Get underlying debt amount for a given asset and scaled amounts. (i.e: How much underlying asset needs to be repaid to cancel a given scaled debt amount stored in state)

address_provider.description: Address provider returns addresses for all protocol contracts

close_factor.description: Maximum percentage of outstanding debt that can be covered by a liquidator

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)

borrow_index.description: Borrow index (Used to compute borrow interest)

collateral_total_scaled.description: Total collateral scaled for the market's currency

debt_total_scaled.description: Total debt scaled for the market's currency

deposit_cap.description: Deposit Cap (defined in terms of the asset)

indexes_last_updated.description: Timestamp (seconds) where indexes and where last updated

interest_rate_model.description: model (params + internal state) that defines how interest rate behaves

liquidation_bonus.description: Bonus amount of collateral liquidator get when repaying user's debt (Will get collateral from user in an amount equal to debt repayed + bonus)

liquidation_threshold.description: Base asset amount in debt position per "base asset" of asset collateral that if surpassed makes the user's position liquidatable.

liquidity_index.description: Liquidity index (Used to compute deposit interest)

max_loan_to_value.description: Max base asset that can be borrowed per "base asset" collateral when using the asset as collateral

reserve_factor.description: Portion of the borrow rate that is kept as protocol rewards

scaled_debt_amount.title: Uint128

scaled_liquidity_amount.title: Uint128

limit.description: Uncollateralized loan limit in this asset
Uncollateralized loan limit in this asset

underlying_debt_amount.title: Uint128

underlying_liquidity_amount.title: Uint128

amount.description: Underlying asset amount that is actually deposited at the current block

amount_scaled.description: Scaled collateral amount stored in contract state

enabled.description: Wether the user is using asset as collateral or not

amount.description: Underlying asset amount that is actually deposited at the current block

amount_scaled.description: Scaled collateral amount stored in contract state

enabled.description: Wether the user is using asset as collateral or not

amount.description: Underlying asset amount that is actually owed at the current block

amount_scaled.description: Scaled debt amount stored in contract state

amount.description: Underlying asset amount that is actually owed at the current block

amount_scaled.description: Scaled debt amount stored in contract state

total_collateralized_debt.description: Total value of all collateralized debts. If the user has an uncollateralized loan limit in an asset, the debt in this asset will not be included in this value.

total_enabled_collateral.description: Total value of all enabled collateral assets. If an asset is disabled as collateral, it will not be included in this value.
